title: NIPER Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Research Scientist Post
description: National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research Ahmedabad (NIPER) has declared the latest job notification fr 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NIPER Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out...
